message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.  Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints.  While $900,000 is lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000. This would still allow me to make a decent profit, and I believe it's a fair price for the value you'll be getting.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking of $950,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to make sure I'm getting the best deal possible.
